title: Transportation: Bus (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Bus subcategory within Transportation. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: For long-distance journeys, all-day and all-night buses are also available.
cards.romaji: Ch.kyori ryok. ni wa, k.sokubasu mo arimasu.
cards.japanese: 長距離旅行には、高速バスもあります。
